attributes.action: De-select George Osborne if he remains as editor of Evening Standard
attributes.background: The former Chancellor thinks it is acceptable to spend four days a week editing the evening standard, and still keep his commons seat as if it is a hereditary entitlement. The idea that Osborne (or any MP) should be allowed to shirk his responsibilities and still collect a salary is insulting.

rejection.details: The selection of candidates is the responsibility of political parties, not the Government or Parliament.
